content.text: Do not change the column headers in Row 1 as this is used to complete the upload.
Vendor ID - Required field with maximum length of 100 characters - Unique identifier for a vendor
Vendor Name - Required field with maximum length of 50 characters- Full name of the vendor
Preferred Name - Optional field with maximum length of 50 characters.
Vendor Type - Optional field with maximum length of 100 characters
Email Address - Required field with maximum length of 100 characters
URL - Optional  field with maximum length of 100 characters
Address Line 1 - Optional field with maximum length of 50 characters.
Address Line 2 - Optional field with maximum length of 50 characters.
City - Optional field with maximum length of 30 characters
Zip/Postal - Optional field with maximum length of 16 characters
Status - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters
Labor Rate - Optional - Hourly rate the vendor charges if assigned labor on work orders
Default Sales Tax ID - Optional field with maximum length of 24 characters
